articles.title: Voting age lowered to 16 in the UK
articles.description: Britain proposed lowering the voting age to 16 for all elections, aiming to boost voter participation and restore trust in the electoral system. This follows historically low voter turnout in the 2024 national elections.

articles.description: Amazon Web Services (AWS) laid off at least hundreds of employees, following CEO Andy Jassy's warning that the adoption of generative AI tools would lead to workforce reductions. This move aligns with similar actions by other tech firms like Microsoft and Meta.

articles.title: UN warns of rising child malnutrition in Gaza
articles.description: The United Nations Relief and Works Agency (UNRWA) reported a sharp increase in child malnutrition in Gaza, with one in ten children screened found to be malnourished. The situation has deteriorated rapidly since Israel intensified its siege in March 2025.
